p: So far, cancer remains a global disease, and the investigation of effective treatment is a great challenge. Metastasis cause the majority of cancer-related deaths in spite of obvious enhancement in gene therapy, surgery, chemotherapy, immunotherapy, and radiotherapy [ 91]. The therapy is complicated by the drug resistance of tumor cells, and serious side effects after chemotherapeutics have become the burning issue. Many in vitro and in vivo studies concerning the antitumor activity of native and modified pectin revealed a decrease of adhesion and cell proliferation, as well as the induction of apoptosis and migration [ 3].
